original: JOHNSON, John Edvard, Disponent, Lidköping, f 29/11 81 av bktjm A J o Christine Samuelson, gm Rut Fouganthine. Språkstud, hdlsinst, hdlsprakt, bkvikariat. Anst Mell Sv Sockerfabr AB 04, kass 05, kont.ch 13, dir.ass 19, vkst dir 33, vkst dir AB Kinnevik o ds dtrbol Sv Suchard AB, Lidköpings Konfekt Ind, AB Idro mfl sed. 36, styr.led dsa. Ag Villa Björkegården Lidkp. Ordf Skarab Rust-håll Lidkp 39—40, Stat hantv- o sniåind.utredn 40—41. Styr.led Mell Sv Lantbr AB, AB Mo-holms Walsqvarn, Sv Chokladfabrik.frn mfl, styr.suppl Halmstads Järnvks AB, rev Rå-bäcks Br AB, Nässjö Stolfabr AB, AB öster- äng, Stift Margretelund mfl. Stud.res i socker-o konf.ind i Tyskl, Belg, Frankr, Österr, Engl, Ital, Schweiz, Tjeckoslov, Ung 21—38. Av trycket: Ett flert småskrift o brosch om sockerprod o sockerbetsodl, bl a »Sockret», »Västergyllens framtid», »Täckdikningen», »Framtidsvärden», »Har vi råd» mfl. RVO ; Frimurare sed. 19. Hobbies: Filateli, urklippsböcker, cykling. AB Kinnevik hette till 36 Mell Sv Sockerfabr AB o är ett holdingbol med 5,2 milj kr akt.-kap — inkl dtrbol 14,3 milj kr.
translated: JOHNSON, John Edvard, Manager, Lidköping, born 29/11 1881 by farmer A J and Christine Samuelson, married to Rut Fouganthine. Language studies, trade institute, practical trading, temporary bank employment. Employed at Mell Sv Sockerfabr AB 1904, cashier 1905, accounting clerk 1913, assistant director 1919, business development director 1933, business development director at AB Kinnevik and its subsidiary, Sv Suchard AB, Lidköpings Konfekt Ind, AB Idro, and others since 1936. Board member of Ag Villa Björkegården Lidkp. Chairman of Skarab Rust-håll Lidkp 1939-1940, State craft and small industry investigation 1940-1941. Board member of Mell Sv Lantbr AB, AB Mo-holms Walsqvarn, Sv Chokladfabrik.frn, and others, deputy board member of Halmstads Järnvks AB, auditor of Rå-bäcks Br AB, Nässjö Stolfabr AB, AB öster-äng, Stift Margretelund and others. Study visits in sugar and confectionery industries in Germany, Belgium, France, Austria, England, Italy, Switzerland, Czechoslovakia, Hungary 1921-1938. Published: Several pamphlets and brochures about sugar production and sugar beet cultivation, including "Sockret", "Västergyllens framtid", "Täckdikningen", "Framtidsvärden", "Har vi råd" and others. Recipient of the Royal Order of Vasa; Freemason since 1919. Hobbies: Philately, scrapbooking, cycling. AB Kinnevik was called Mell Sv Sockerfabr AB until 1936 and is a holding company with SEK 5.2 million in share capital - including its subsidiaries with SEK 14.3 million.

memberOf.name: State Craft and Small Industry Investigation
